titles.title: Greener Government Act of 1993
To incorporate environmentally sound principles into certain ongoing programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation.

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Greener Government Act of 1993 - Provides for the incorporation of environmentally sound principles in programs under the Stevenson-Wydler Technology Innovation Act of 1980, the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act, the National Aeronautics and Space Act of 1958, and the National Science Foundation Act of 1950.
